Usage and examples¶

The detailed runnable examples are available in the Examples and Quickstart pages. For a short, runnable script use examples/run_simple.py (see the Examples section in the docs).

If you want to run the longer notebook examples, open run_folps_numpy.ipynb or run_folps_jax.ipynb in Jupyter or Colab.
